resources.string: Fruit comes in many varieties, and so do songs about fruit. Here\'s our list of the best fruit songs, as voted on by music fans like you. The best songs about fruit come from rock bands, hip-hop artists and country musicians. No matter what your taste, you will find a delicious fruit song on this comprehensive list. There are songs about apples, songs about cherries, and songs about bananas represented below, as well as songs about peaches, oranges and even coconuts.
